questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Signage directing retail
D) Wildlife and animals

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A red directional sign
D) A car

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A family
B) A retail store
C) A red arrow sign
D) A playground

What does the sign in the photo indicate?
A) A park entrance
B) A retail area
C) A beach direction
D) A residential area

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is written on the sign?
A) "Park"
B) "Beach"
C) "Retail"
D) "Exit

What is the shape of the sign?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Arrow-shaped

A) Trees and plants
B) Ocean waves
C) Concrete ceiling and pipes

A) A car
B) A red directional sign

D) A tree

A) Wood
B) Concrete
C) Glass
D) Metal

A) With nails

C) Hanging by wires
D) Mounted on a pole

A) Blue and white

A) Hidden behind objects

A) Natural sunlight from above

A) Vertical

D) Yellow
